modules.name: Distinguishable Beetroots
modules.description: Makes partially grown beetroots more discreet, making it more evident when they're fully grown.

modules.name: Distinguishable Carrots
modules.description: Adds flowers to the final growth phase of carrots, making it more evident when they're fully grown.

modules.name: Distinguishable Potatoes
modules.description: Makes partially grown potatoes more discreet and adds flowers to their final growth phase, making it more evident when they're fully grown.

modules.name: Distinguishable Wheat
modules.description: Makes partially grown wheat greener, making it more evident when it's fully grown.

modules.name: Distinguishable Nether Wart
modules.description: Desaturates partially grown nether wart, making it more evident when it's fully grown.

modules.name: Nether Flux
modules.description: Renames and retextures ancient debris and netherite scrap to nether flux and nether flux ore.

modules.name: Pride Apple
modules.description: Renames and retextures the enchanted golden apple to celebrate trans pride.

modules.name: Lush Glow Lichen
modules.description: Retextures glow lichen to the lush caves palette to make it more distinct from diamond ore.

modules.name: Colorful Ender Pearls
modules.description: Makes ender pearls slowly cycle through the color spectrum.

modules.name: Alurien Flame
modules.description: Renames soul flame (torches, flames, lanterns, campfires) to Alurien flame, after the resource pack creator.
